title: Put Carts CartId LineItem LineItemId Schema

billingAddress.description: The billing address for a cart.

shippingAddress.description: The shipping address for a cart.

lineItemContainer.description: Contains the line items of a cart.

minCartValue.description: The minimum order value of a shop.

checkoutURL.description: The URL that redirects the browser to the merchant's shop in order to complete the checkout.
